item.title: 1DEA337A FB40 4EB6 A103 1E470B1CABE4
item.description: #define BITCOUNT(x) (((BX_(x)+(BX_(x)»4)) & 0x0F0F0F0F) % 255) #define BX_(x) ((x) - (((x)»1)&0x77777777) - (((x)»2)&0x33333333) - (((x)»3)&0x11111111)) -- really weird C code to count the number of bits in a word
